inkumbulo yofikelelo olungenamkhethe: Inkumbulo eguquguqukayo apho iinkqubo ezisebenzayo kunye nedatha zigcinwa
hard disk drive: Umthamo omkhulu wesixhobo sokugcina esingaguquguqukiyo usebenzisa iiplatters zemagnethi
i-slid state drive: Ukugcinwa okungaguquguqukiyo kusetyenziswa inkumbulo ekhanyayo, ekhawulezayo kuneeHDD
motherboard: Ibhodi yesekethe ephambili edibanisa onke amacandelo ekhompyuter
idilesi ye-ip: Isazisi samanani esisodwa esabelwe isixhobo ngasinye kuthungelwano
bandwidth: Owona mlinganiselo uphezulu wogqithiso lwedata kwindlela yothungelwano
ukubambezeleka: Ukulibaziseka kwexesha lokuba idatha ihambe ukusuka kwindawo ekuyiwa kuyo
